properties.title: Alive in Afghanistan
properties.description: <p>Alive in Afghanistan empowers Afghan citizens to participate in society by reporting on their political process.</p> <p><a href="http://www.aliveinafghanistan.org">website</a></p>

properties.title: Voices of Africa
properties.description: <p>Voices of Africa is a training programme initiated by Voices of Africa Media Foundation. Its goal is to empower you African men and women with limited media experience to pursue a career as community reporter. Central to the training programme is the potential of the mobile phone as a powerful reporting tool.<p> <p><a href="http://voicesofafrica.africanews.com">website</a></p>
